name: Peaceful neighborhood Quiet room Close to Harvard
neighborhood_overview: Safe and quiet neighborhood. Things are quite orderly and organized here. Street parking is easy and no permit is required. A large Star Market (grocery store) is only about 6 minute walk.
description:
